title: All of You
description: Jillian's life has been hard. She has secrets to hide and doesn't allow anyone except her family to get close to her. She's lost her faith in humanity, but vows to remain a good, kind, and decent person.Lincoln could be the ultimate playboy. He has fame, money, and a kick-ass job as a professional hockey player. He has everything anyone could ever want - except someone who doesn't care about any of that.Jillian and Lincoln could be perfect for each other...if they could only stop their secrets from destroying their happiness.
author: Jenni Wilder
